attributes.action: Call a vote of no confidence in the current administration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition demands that the prime minister calls a vote of no confidence in the current administration.
With such scandals as not giving a referendum on the EU treaty, losing confidential personal data, the northern rock fiasco, people’s pensions being sucked dry, horrendous levels of taxation upon petrol and diesel, and many other incompetent acts.
The people who sign this petition are rightly fed up with poor leadership, they demand a government that is capable of delivering world class services our tax pays for, and also we want policy that is good for our nation and people.
Under the current limp administration this is not possible.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
